difficulty.title: Took me 10 hours to beat Vordt of the Boreal Valley : r/darksouls3 - Reddit
difficulty.body: And 2 weeks for Vordt, I didnt want to seem like I was flexing on OP though. The games difficulty was far far steeper than I anticipated. Combine this with no experience (first souls like) and it was hell for a bit there. Dont worry though, I definately got better. I killed Nameless King in 6 attempts and Midir in (less than 10, I cant recall ...

difficulty.title: How To Beat Vordt of the Boreal Valley in Dark Souls 3
difficulty.body: Vordt of the Boreal Valley in Dark Souls 3 can be considered the second boss of the game. This is also the first time you may encounter the Frostbite status effect in the game. ... strategy.title: How To Beat Vordt of the Boreal Valley in Dark Souls 3
strategy.body: You must defeat Vordt of the Boreal Valley in Dark Souls 3 to progress to the Undead Settlement. He is not optional.. Strategies for Defeating Vordt of the Boreal Valley.
